              def wall_height_requirement_text(user_height)
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            
              8
            

            
              
            

                thresholds = SafetyStandard::SLIDE_HEIGHT_THRESHOLDS
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            
              8
            

            
              
            

                case user_height
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 2
                
              
            

                when 0..thresholds[:no_walls_required]
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                  "No containing walls required"
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 2
                
              
            

                when thresholds[:no_walls_required]..thresholds[:basic_walls]
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                  "Walls must be at least #{user_height}m (equal to user height)"
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 2
                
              
            

                when thresholds[:basic_walls]..thresholds[:enhanced_walls]
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                  "Walls must be at least #{(user_height * 1.25).round(2)}m (1.25 user height)"
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 2
                
              
            

                when thresholds[:enhanced_walls]..thresholds[:max_safe_height]
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                  "Walls must be at least #{(user_height * 1.25).round(2)}m + permanent roof required"
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                else
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                  "Exceeds safe height limits (>#{thresholds[:max_safe_height]}m)"
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            
              16

              def replace_dimensions

              def select_unit
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            
              18
            

            
              
            

                @units = current_user.units
          
      204.

              18
            

            
              
            

                @title = t("inspections.titles.select_unit")
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            
              
            

                # Apply the same filters as the units index
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            
              18
            

            
              
                
                  then: 2
                
              
                
                  else: 16
                
              
            

                if params[:search].present?
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                  @units = @units.where("name LIKE ? OR serial LIKE ? OR manufacturer LIKE ?",
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            
              
            

                    "%#{params[:search]}%", "%#{params[:search]}%", "%#{params[:search]}%")
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            
              18
            

            
              
                
                  then: 1
                
              
                
                  else: 17
                
              
            

                if params[:manufacturer].present?
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  @units = @units.where(manufacturer: params[:manufacturer])
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            
              18
            

            
              
                
                  then: 1
                
              
                
                  else: 17
                
              
            

                if params[:has_slide].present?
          
      217.

              1

      218.

              def update_unit

              def complete
          
      275.

                # Check if inspection can be completed

      277.

      279.

      280.

      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282.

      283.

                  @inspection.complete!(current_user)
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286.

      287.

      288.

      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289.

      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290.

      291.

              def mark_draft

              def inspection_params
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            

            
              
            

                # Get the base params with permitted top-level attributes
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            
              47
            

            
              
            

                inspection_specific_params = [:inspection_date, :inspection_location, :passed, :comments, :unit_id, :inspector_company_id, :unique_report_number]
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            
              47
            

            
              
            

                copyable_attributes = Inspection.new.copyable_attributes_via_reflection
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            
              47
            

            
              
            

                base_params = params.require(:inspection).permit(inspection_specific_params + copyable_attributes)
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            

            
              
            

                # For each assessment, dynamically permit attributes based on the model
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            

            
              
            

                assessment_types = %w[
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            
              47
            

            
              
            

                  user_height_assessment
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            

            
              
            

                  slide_assessment
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            

            
              
            

                  structure_assessment
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            

            
              
            

                  anchorage_assessment
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            

            
              
            

                  materials_assessment
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            

            
              
            

                  fan_assessment
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            

            
              
            

                  enclosed_assessment
          
      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            

            
              
            

                ]
          
      321. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    321. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      322. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    322. 
            
              47
            

            
              
            

                assessment_types.each do |assessment_type|
          
      323. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    323. 
            
              329
            

            
              
                
                  else: 10
                
              
                
                  then: 319
                
              
            

                  next unless params[:inspection]["#{assessment_type}_attributes"].present?
          
      324. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    324. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      325. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    325. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Get permitted attributes dynamically from the assessment model
          
      326. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    326. 
            
              10
            

            
              
            

                  permitted_attrs = permitted_assessment_attributes(assessment_type)
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            

            
              
            

                  
          
      328. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    328. 
            
              10
            

            
              
                
                  then: 10
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  if permitted_attrs.any?
          
      329. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    329. 
            
              10
            

            
              
            

                    base_params["#{assessment_type}_attributes"] = 
          
      330. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    330. 
            

            
              
            

                      params[:inspection]["#{assessment_type}_attributes"].permit(*permitted_attrs)
          
      331. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    331. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      332. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    332. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      333. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    333. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      334. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    334. 
            
              47
            

            
              
            

                base_params
          
      335. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    335. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      336. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    336. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      337. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    337. 
            
              15
            

            
              
            

              def permitted_assessment_attributes(assessment_type)
          
      338. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    338. 
            

            
              
            

                # Convert assessment_type string to model class
          
      339. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    339. 
            
              10
            

            
              
            

                model_class = assessment_type.camelize.constantize
          
      340. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    340. 
            

            
              
            

                
          
      341. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    341. 
            

            
              
            

                # Get all column names from the model
          
      342. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    342. 
            
              10
            

            
              
            

                all_attributes = model_class.column_names
          
      343. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    343. 
            

            
              
            

                
          
      344. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    344. 
            

            
              
            

                # Exclude system/protected attributes (but keep id for updates)
          
      345. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    345. 
            
              10
            

            
              
            

                excluded_attributes = %w[inspection_id created_at updated_at]
          
      346. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    346. 
            

            
              
            

                
          
      347. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    347. 
            

            
              
            

                # Return the permitted attributes
          
      348. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    348. 
            
              10
            

            
              
            

                (all_attributes - excluded_attributes).map(&:to_sym)
          
      349. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    349. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue NameError
          
      350. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    350. 
            

            
              
            

                # If model class doesn't exist, return empty array
          
      351. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    351. 
            

            
              
            

                []
          
      352. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    352. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      353. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    353. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      354. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    354. 
            
              15
            

            
              
            

              def no_index
          
      355. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    355. 
            
              435
            

            
              
            

                response.set_header("X-Robots-Tag", "noindex,nofollow")
          
      356. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    356. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      357. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    357. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      358. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    358.

              def set_inspection
          
      359. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    359. 
            

            
              
            

                # Try exact match first, then case-insensitive match for user-friendly URLs
          
      360. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    360. 
            
              380
            

            
              
            

                @inspection = Inspection.find_by(id: params[:id]) ||
          
      361. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    361. 
            

            
              
            

                  Inspection.find_by("UPPER(id) = ?", params[:id].upcase)
          
      362. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    362. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      363. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    363. 
            
              380
            

            
              
                
                  else: 363
                
              
                
                  then: 17
                
              
            

                unless @inspection
          
      364. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    364. 
            
              17
            

            
              
            

                  if action_name.in?(["report", "qr_code"])
          
      365. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    365. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 14
                
              
            

                    # For public report access, return 404 instead of redirect
          
      366. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    366. 
            
              14
            

            
              
            

                    render file: "#{Rails.root}/public/404.html", status: :not_found, layout: false
          
      367. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    367. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 3
                
              
            

                  else
          
      368. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    368. 
            
              3
            

            
              
            

                    flash[:alert] = I18n.t("inspections.errors.not_found")
          
      369. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    369. 
            
              3
            

            
              
            

                    redirect_to inspections_path and return
          
      370. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    370. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      371. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    371. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      372. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    372. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      373. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    373. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      374. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    374. 
            
              15
            

            
              
            

              def check_inspection_owner
          
      375. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    375. 
            
              268
            

            
              
                
                  else: 259
                
              
                
                  then: 9
                
              
            

                unless @inspection.user_id == current_user.id
          
      376. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    376. 
            
              9
            

            
              
            

                  flash[:alert] = I18n.t("inspections.errors.access_denied")
          
      377.

                  redirect_to inspections_path and return
          
      378.

      379.

      380.

              def redirect_if_complete
          
      382. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    382. 
            
              213
            

            
              
                
                  then: 213
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 7

              def copy_dimensions_from(source)

                def with_similar_dimensions(reference, tolerance: 0.1)

      310.

      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                  length_range = (reference.length * (1 - tolerance))..(reference.length * (1 + tolerance))
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                  height_range = (reference.height * (1 - tolerance))..(reference.height * (1 + tolerance))
          
      313.

      314.

                def dimension_statistics

    319. 
            

            
              
            

                  {
          
      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    width: {avg: average(:width), min: minimum(:width), max: maximum(:width)},
          
      321. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    321. 
            

            
              
            

                    length: {avg: average(:length), min: minimum(:length), max: maximum(:length)},
          
      322. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    322. 
            

            
              
            

                    height: {avg: average(:height), min: minimum(:height), max: maximum(:height)},
          
      323. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    323. 
            

            
              
            

                    area: {avg: average("width * length"), min: minimum("width * length"), max: maximum("width * length")}
          
      324.

              def log_audit_action(action, user, details)

              def generate_unique_report_number

      207.

            # RPII Utility - Business rules and calculations model
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2.

            class SafetyStandard

                1200 => {label: "1.2m (Children)", max_users: :calculate_by_area},

                def calculation_metadata
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                  {
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            
              337
            

            
              
            

                    anchors: {
          
      99.

                      title: "Anchor Requirements",
          
      100.

                      description: "Anchors must be calculated based on the play area to ensure adequate ground restraint for wind loads.",
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                      method_name: :calculate_required_anchors,
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                      example_input: 25.0,
          
      103.

                      output_unit: "anchors",
          
      105.

                      formula_text: "((Area  #{ANCHOR_CALCULATION_CONSTANTS[:area_coefficient]})  #{ANCHOR_CALCULATION_CONSTANTS[:base_divisor]})  #{ANCHOR_CALCULATION_CONSTANTS[:safety_factor]} safety factor",
          
      106.

                      standard_reference: "EN 14960:2019"

                      method_name: :calculate_user_capacity,
          
      112.

                      example_input: [5.0, 4.0, 2.0],
          
      113.

                      input_unit: ["length (m)", "width (m)", "negative adjustment (m)"],

      115.

                    slide_runout: {

      137.

    138. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            
              16
            

            
              
            

                def get_method_source(method_name)
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            
              142
            

            
              
            

                  method_obj = method(method_name)
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            
              142
            

            
              
            

                  source_location = method_obj.source_location
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            
              142
            

            
              
                
                  else: 142
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                  return "Source code not available" unless source_location
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            
              142
            

            
              
            

                  file_path, line_number = source_location
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            
              142
            

            
              
                
                  else: 142
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                  return "Source file not found" unless File.exist?(file_path)
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            
              142
            

            
              
            

                  lines = File.readlines(file_path)
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            
              142
            

            
              
            

                  method_lines = extract_method_lines(lines, line_number - 1, method_name)
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Add related constants for complete transparency
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            
              142
            

            
              
            

                  related_constants = get_related_constants(method_name)
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
              142
            

            
              
                
                  then: 142
                
              
            

                  if related_constants.any?
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            
              142
            

            
              
            

                    constants_section = "\n# Related Constants:\n"
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            
              142
            

            
              
            

                    related_constants.each do |constant_name|
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            
              178
            

            
              
            

                      constants_section += extract_constant_definition(lines, constant_name)
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            
              142
            

            
              
            

                    constants_section + "\n# Method Implementation:\n" + method_lines.join("")
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  else
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

                    method_lines.join("")
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue => e
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

                  "Error retrieving source: #{e.message}"
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
              16
            

            
              
            

                def get_related_constants(method_name)
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            
              142
            

            
              
            

                  case method_name
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 36
                
              
            

                  when :calculate_required_anchors
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            
              36
            

            
              
            

                    ["ANCHOR_CALCULATION_CONSTANTS"]
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 35
                
              
            

                  when :calculate_user_capacity
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            
              35
            

            
              
            

                    ["USER_SPACE_REQUIREMENTS"]
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 35
                
              
            

                  when :calculate_required_runout
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
              35
            

            
              
            

                    ["RUNOUT_CALCULATION_CONSTANTS"]
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 36
                
              
            

                  when :meets_height_requirements?
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            
              36
            

            
              
            

                    ["SLIDE_HEIGHT_THRESHOLDS", "WALL_HEIGHT_CONSTANTS"]
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  else
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

                    []
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
              16
            

            
              
            

                def extract_constant_definition(lines, constant_name)
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            
              178
            

            
              
            

                  constant_lines = []
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            
              178
            

            
              
            

                  in_constant = false
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            
              178
            

            
              
            

                  brace_count = 0
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            
              178
            

            
              
            

                  lines.each_with_index do |line, index|
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            
              5830
            

            
              
                
                  then: 178
                
              
                
                  else: 5652
                
              
            

                    if line.strip.start_with?("#{constant_name} =")
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            
              178
            

            
              
            

                      in_constant = true
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            
              178
            

            
              
            

                      constant_lines << "#{index + 1}: #{line}"
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            
              178
            

            
              
            

                      brace_count += line.count("{") - line.count("}")
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            
              178
            

            
              
            

                      next
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            
              5652
            

            
              
                
                  then: 676
                
              
                
                  else: 4976
                
              
            

                    if in_constant
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            
              676
            

            
              
            

                      constant_lines << "#{index + 1}: #{line}"
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            
              676
            

            
              
            

                      brace_count += line.count("{") - line.count("}")
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Check if we've closed all braces and reached the end
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            
              676
            

            
              
                
                  then: 178
                
              
                
                  else: 498
                
              
            

                      if brace_count <= 0 && (line.strip.end_with?(".freeze") || line.strip == "}")
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            
              178
            

            
              
            

                        break
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            
              178
            

            
              
            

                  constant_lines.join("")
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            
              16
            

            
              
            

                def generate_example(calculation_type)
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            
              140
            

            
              
            

                  metadata = calculation_metadata[calculation_type]
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            
              140
            

            
              
                
                  else: 140
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                  return "No metadata available" unless metadata
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            
              140
            

            
              
            

                  case calculation_type
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 35
                
              
            

                  when :anchors
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            
              35
            

            
              
            

                    area = metadata[:example_input]
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            
              35
            

            
              
            

                    result = calculate_required_anchors(area)
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            
              35
            

            
              
            

                    "For #{area}#{metadata[:input_unit]} area: #{result} #{metadata[:output_unit]} required"
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 35
                
              
            

                  when :user_capacity
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            
              35
            

            
              
            

                    length, width, negative_adj = metadata[:example_input]
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            
              35
            

            
              
            

                    result = calculate_user_capacity(length, width, negative_adj)
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            
              35
            

            
              
            

                    usable_area = (length * width) - negative_adj
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            
              35
            

            
              
            

                    "For #{length}m  #{width}m (#{usable_area}m usable): #{result[:users_1200mm]} children (1.2m category)"
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 35
                
              
            

                  when :slide_runout
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            
              35
            

            
              
            

                    platform_height = metadata[:example_input]
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            
              35
            

            
              
            

                    result = calculate_required_runout(platform_height)
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            
              35
            

            
              
            

                    "For #{platform_height}#{metadata[:input_unit]} platform: #{result}#{metadata[:output_unit]} runout required"
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 35
                
              
            

                  when :wall_height
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            
              35
            

            
              
            

                    user_height = metadata[:example_input]
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            
              35
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    case user_height
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                    when 0..SLIDE_HEIGHT_THRESHOLDS[:no_walls_required]
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            
              
            

                      requirement = "No containing walls required"
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 35
                
              
            

                    when SLIDE_HEIGHT_THRESHOLDS[:no_walls_required]..SLIDE_HEIGHT_THRESHOLDS[:basic_walls]
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            
              35
            

            
              
            

                      requirement = "Walls must be at least #{user_height}m (equal to user height)"
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                    when SLIDE_HEIGHT_THRESHOLDS[:basic_walls]..SLIDE_HEIGHT_THRESHOLDS[:enhanced_walls]
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            
              
            

                      multiplier = WALL_HEIGHT_CONSTANTS[:enhanced_height_multiplier]
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            
              
            

                      requirement = "Walls must be at least #{(user_height * multiplier).round(2)}m (#{multiplier} user height)"
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            
              35
            

            
              
            

                    "For #{user_height}#{metadata[:input_unit]} user height: #{requirement}"
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  else
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            
              
            

                    "Example not available for #{calculation_type}"
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            
              16
            

            
              
            

                def meets_height_requirements?(user_height, containing_wall_height)
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            
              
            

                  # EN 14960:2019 - Containing wall heights must scale with user height using WALL_HEIGHT_CONSTANTS
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            
              53
            

            
              
                
                  then: 2
                
              
                
                  else: 51
                
              
            

                  return false if user_height.nil? || containing_wall_height.nil?
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            
              51
            

            
              
            

                  enhanced_multiplier = WALL_HEIGHT_CONSTANTS[:enhanced_height_multiplier]
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            
              51
            

            
              
            

                  case user_height
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 2
                
              
            

                  when 0..SLIDE_HEIGHT_THRESHOLDS[:no_walls_required]
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                    true # No containing walls required
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 40
                
              
            

                  when SLIDE_HEIGHT_THRESHOLDS[:no_walls_required]..SLIDE_HEIGHT_THRESHOLDS[:basic_walls]
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            
              40
            

            
              
            

                    containing_wall_height >= user_height
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 5
                
              
            

                  when SLIDE_HEIGHT_THRESHOLDS[:basic_walls]..SLIDE_HEIGHT_THRESHOLDS[:enhanced_walls]
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            
              5
            

            
              
            

                    containing_wall_height >= (user_height * enhanced_multiplier)
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 2
                
              
            

                  when SLIDE_HEIGHT_THRESHOLDS[:enhanced_walls]..SLIDE_HEIGHT_THRESHOLDS[:max_safe_height]
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                    containing_wall_height >= (user_height * enhanced_multiplier) # Plus permanent roof required
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 2
                
              
            

                  else
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            
              2
            

            
              
            

                    false # Exceeds safe height limits
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            
              16
            

            
              
            

                def meets_runout_requirements?(runout_length, platform_height)
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            
              
            

                  # EN 14960:2019 - Slide runout length must be minimum 50% of platform height or 300mm, whichever is greater, to ensure safe deceleration
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            
              12
            

            
              
                
                  then: 2
                
              
                
                  else: 10
                
              
            

                  return false if runout_length.nil? || platform_height.nil?
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            
              10
            

            
              
            

                  required_runout = calculate_required_runout(platform_height)
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            
              10
            

            
              
            

                  runout_length >= required_runout
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            
              16
            

            
              
            

                def calculate_required_runout(platform_height)
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            
              
            

                  # EN 14960:2019 - Minimum runout distance calculation using RUNOUT_CALCULATION_CONSTANTS for safe landing
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            
              61
            

            
              
                
                  then: 3
                
              
                
                  else: 58
                
              
            

                  return 0 if platform_height.nil? || platform_height <= 0
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Calculate using constants from RUNOUT_CALCULATION_CONSTANTS
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            
              58
            

            
              
            

                  height_ratio = RUNOUT_CALCULATION_CONSTANTS[:platform_height_ratio]
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            
              58
            

            
              
            

                  minimum_runout = RUNOUT_CALCULATION_CONSTANTS[:minimum_runout_meters]
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            
              58
            

            
              
            

                  [platform_height * height_ratio, minimum_runout].max
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            
              16
            

            
              
            

                def calculate_required_anchors(area_m2)
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            
              
            

                  # EN 14960:2019 - Anchor point calculation: ((Area  area_coefficient)  base_divisor)  safety_factor, ensuring adequate ground restraint for wind loads
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Formula from original Windows app: ((Area  area_coefficient)  base_divisor)  safety_factor, rounded up
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            
              170
            

            
              
                
                  then: 3
                
              
                
                  else: 167
                
              
            

                  return 0 if area_m2.nil? || area_m2 <= 0
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Formula using constants from ANCHOR_CALCULATION_CONSTANTS
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            
              167
            

            
              
            

                  area_coeff = ANCHOR_CALCULATION_CONSTANTS[:area_coefficient]
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            
              167
            

            
              
            

                  base_div = ANCHOR_CALCULATION_CONSTANTS[:base_divisor]
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            
              167
            

            
              
            

                  safety_mult = ANCHOR_CALCULATION_CONSTANTS[:safety_factor]
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            
              167
            

            
              
            

                  ((area_m2.to_f**2 * area_coeff) / base_div * safety_mult).ceil
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            
              16
            

            
              
            

                def calculate_user_capacity(length, width, negative_adjustment = 0)
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            
              
            

                  # EN 14960:2019 - User capacity based on age-appropriate space allocation using USER_SPACE_REQUIREMENTS constants
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            
              55
            

            
              
                
                  then: 2
                
              
                
                  else: 53
                
              
            

                  return {} if length.nil? || width.nil?
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            
              53
            

            
              
            

                  usable_area = (length * width) - (negative_adjustment || 0)
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            
              53
            

            
              
                
                  then: 2
                
              
                
                  else: 51
                
              
            

                  return {} if usable_area <= 0
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Standard capacity calculation using constants from USER_SPACE_REQUIREMENTS
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            

            
              
            

                  {
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            
              102
            

            
              
            

                    users_1000mm: (usable_area / USER_SPACE_REQUIREMENTS[:young_children_1000mm]).floor,
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            
              51
            

            
              
            

                    users_1200mm: (usable_area / USER_SPACE_REQUIREMENTS[:children_1200mm]).floor,
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            
              51
            

            
              
            

                    users_1500mm: (usable_area / USER_SPACE_REQUIREMENTS[:adolescents_1500mm]).floor,
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            
              51
            

            
              
            

                    users_1800mm: (usable_area / USER_SPACE_REQUIREMENTS[:adults_1800mm]).floor
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            
              16
            

            
              
            

                def slide_calculations
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            

            
              
            

                  # EN 14960:2019 - Comprehensive slide safety requirements including containing wall heights, runout specifications, and gradient limitations
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            

            
              
            

                  {
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                    containing_wall_heights: {
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            

            
              
            

                      under_600mm: "No containing walls required",
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            

            
              
            

                      between_600_3000mm: "Containing walls required of user height",
          
      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            

            
              
            

                      between_3000_6000mm: "Containing walls required #{WALL_HEIGHT_CONSTANTS[:enhanced_height_multiplier]} times user height",
          
      321. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    321. 
            

            
              
            

                      over_6000mm: "Both containing walls AND permanent roof required"
          
      322. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    322. 
            

            
              
            

                    },
          
      323. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    323. 
            

            
              
            

                    runout_requirements: {
          
      324. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    324. 
            

            
              
            

                      minimum_length: "50% of highest platform height",
          
      325. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    325. 
            

            
              
            

                      absolute_minimum: "300mm in any case",
          
      326. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    326. 
            

            
              
            

                      maximum_inclination: "Not more than 10",
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            

            
              
            

                      stop_wall_addition: "If fitted, adds 50cm to required run-out length",
          
      328. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    328. 
            

            
              
            

                      wall_height_requirement: "50% of user height on run-out sides"
          
      329. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    329. 
            

            
              
            

                    },
          
      330. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    330. 
            

            
              
            

                    safety_factors: {
          
      331. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    331. 
            

            
              
            

                      first_metre_gradient: "Special requirements for first metre of slope",
          
      332. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    332. 
            

            
              
            

                      surface_requirements: "Non-slip surface material required",
          
      333. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    333. 
            

            
              
            

                      edge_protection: "Rounded edges and smooth transitions"
          
      334. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    334. 
            

            
              
            

                    }
          
      335. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    335. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      336. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    336. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      337. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    337. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      338. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    338. 
            
              16
            

            
              
            

                def anchor_formulas

                def valid_stitch_length?(length_mm)
          
      410. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    410. 
            

            
              
            

                  # EN 14960:2019 - Stitch length must be within specified range to ensure adequate seam strength while maintaining fabric integrity
          
      411. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    411. 
            
              10

      412. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    412. 
            
              10
            

            
              
            

                  max_length = MATERIAL_STANDARDS[:thread][:stitch_length_max]
          
      413. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    413. 
            
              10
            

            
              
            

                  length_mm.present? && length_mm.between?(min_length, max_length)
          
      414. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    414. 
            

            
              
            

                end
